sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

JH

I am a passionate Full-Stack Developer and DevOps Specialist with experience in building and deploying web applications across multiple cloud environments. My journey in technology began in the United States Army, where I developed strong leadership and problem-solving skills while managing logistics operations.

After transitioning from military service, I pursued my passion for technology through intensive training programs and apprenticeships, quickly advancing to become a Junior DevOps Deployment Specialist. I specialize in JavaScript, React, HTML, CSS, and cloud technologies including AWS and Google Cloud Platform.

I'm dedicated to creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly web applications that solve real-world problems. My background in both development and operations gives me a unique perspective on the full software lifecycle, from concept to deployment and maintenance.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy staying up-to-date with the latest technology trends and continuously expanding my skillset through self-learning and professional development.

); }; export default About;
